name: Shambling Mound
description: A mass of rotting vegetation animated by natural or magical forces, resembling a large mound with tendrils for ensnaring prey.
memorable: Its ability to heal from lightning damage makes it a dangerous opponent in combat.
goals: To consume both animals and plants for nutrients.
relations: Often found in swamps and forested areas, may encounter other swamp or plant monsters.
strengths: Resistant to cold and fire damage; immune to lightning and certain conditions; can grapple and engulf enemies.
weaknesses: Low agility hampers its movement and predictability; has specific weak points against certain damage types.
attacks: Uses slam attacks to deal bludgeoning damage, can grapple and engulf prey, dealing ongoing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Absorption, allowing it to heal when struck by lightning damage.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to navigate without sight.
skills: Proficient in stealth, enhancing its ability to ambush foes.
additional_information: Emits a noxious smell that can poison nearby creatures.
Regenerates from wounds, increasing its survivability.
Can engulf a grappled creature, keeping it restrained and unable to breathe.
Exceptionally strong with high strength and constitution.
Blends well into natural environments, making it a threat in its habitats.
test_queries: plant creature that heals from lightning
creature that engulfs and grapples enemies
